title: Speed interval check mailbox
creator: war2211111
content: Good afternoon, dear friends. Thanks for the awesome program for the android version, I use it on my computer too. Can you tell me how to set the frequency of checking emails more often than the 15-minute interval? In other android mail clients, emails arrive almost immediately, within 5-10 seconds, but here the verification interval is very long, and manual verification is such a thing. How do I set it up?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Xiaomi 14T
